name: Block Hope
description:
Behold for the addictiveness of the summer. Block Hope is full of thrilling small casual activities where you need to run faster on your right but you need to watch out for the bar chasing you.

A simple blocky art game with a simple gameplay. Just tap left and right arrows and jump with your right thumb clicking on that particular button

Lets have fun with Block Hope because block is our only hope for time based side scroller madness.

Product of Gamebread
